scripts.postinstall: if not exist .next\server\bin mkdir .next\server\bin && powershell -Command "(New-Object System.Net.WebClient).DownloadFile('https://github.com/yt-dlp/yt-dlp/releases/latest/download/yt-dlp.exe', '.next\server\bin\yt-dlp.exe'); if ($?) { Write-Host 'yt-dlp downloaded successfully' } else { Write-Host 'Failed to download yt-dlp' -ForegroundColor Red; exit 1 }"
